Class CityDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • iwb.repository.impl.CityDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CityDAO

    @Named(value="cityDAO")
public class CityDAOImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CityDAO
    City DAO implements methods to create, retreive, update and delete cities
